cause.description:
JustGive (www.justgive.org) is not only making fundraising easy and affordable but eco-friendly. JustGive is a nonprofit organization whose website connects people with the charities and causes they care about by enabling them to donation to any of the 1,000,000 nonprofits registered in the U.S. Their mission is to increase charitable giving by providing the resources and tools people need to make giving part of their everyday life.
1. Charity Wedding Registry
2. Charity Gift Certificates
3. Charity Wish List
cause.mission: to connect people with the charities and causes they care about and to increase overall giving.
